rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear that a newfangled
vehicle has been constructed
right here in Iira!

rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0002
rows.name:
It seems to be a massive craft that
can traverse the Cloud Sea even without
the power of a Divine Beast...

rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently palace soldiers and local
engineers worked together to build
it. It was only completed recently.

rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0004
rows.name:
It had some sort of name, but what was
it? Something with "mo"...? "Mo"...
"Mo"... Well, something like that.

rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sure they could have used my help,
but I have no time for such things. I
always put my own inventions first!

rows.label: tlk70000017_05_msg0006
rows.name:
They begged me to help, of
course, but I turned them
down - twice! Gah hah hah!
